strow.stentry: Calculated by HIC, could not be available for some prescriptions, if not available use corrected_prescribed_date instead

This is a calculated field by HIC. If the PRESCRIBED_DATE exists, then this field will be set to that date. Otherwise, if there is no PRESCRIBED_DATE, the corrected_PRESCRIBED_DATE will be set to the 1st of the data month
The date when the prescription was written.
Could not be available for some patients as it might not be available on the prescription itself.
